Sugiyama died some years ago.

@...> wrote:

      =

      Bob - 



Sugiyama does not handle things anymore, at least not dire=
ctly. I've always used Bob Benson as agent but understand Robert Hughs also=
 does this service. I'm sure there are others that people use, too. 



As =
for shinsa results, of course a fully polished sword will allow for a more =
reliable judgement by the team, but a sword just a little out of full polis=
h would probably work okay. The judges have to be able to see and read the =
sword's characteristics, so if that is mostly hidden, well, they can't see =
behind what's hidden. If there is a signature, I guess they would paper it =
based on that, but I'd say condition needs to be reasonably good. 



Ron

=
STL
